name: beginSheet(with:modalFor:delegate:didEnd:contextInfo:)
desc: Presents a page setup sheet for the specified print info object, document-modal relative to the specified window.
declaration:
func beginSheet(with printInfo: NSPrintInfo, 
       modalFor docWindow: NSWindow, 
       delegate: Any?, 
         didEnd didEndSelector: Selector?, 
    contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
